Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Isah ngala yalola hakari wabu obukhayi nibuliho yaboola mbu; “Ni wina omukhoonyi wanje khu Nyasaye?” Abechi bebe nibaboola; “Efwe khuli abakhoonyibo khu Nyasaye, Khusuubile Nyasaye ne ba Omuloli mbu efwe khuli Abasalamu.”
Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, khusuubile akaweshia, ne khuloondele – injila- yo Omurumwa kho khuhandiche halala nende abaloli
Abakhayi nibatuta nibapanga amakhuwa Naye Nyasaye napanga, naye Nyasaye niye Omupanji umalayo

Olwa Nyasaye yaboola mbu ; “Ewe Isah esie nditsa okhubukula ne nditsa okhukulusia ewanje ne nditsa okhukhuliinda okhurulana nende Abakhayi balia ne nditsa okhura balia bakhuloonda hekulu wabalia bakhukhaya okhula inyanga yeyindukho. Ne amakalushilo kenyu kaliba khwisie, ndilibabusilia kalia kamwakabukhananga
Ne balia bakhaya ndilibahelesia eshinyasio eshilulu mushialo nende mwikulu ne shibalinyoola ubahabina tawe
Ne balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi Nyasaye alibarunga omurungo kwabu omulaamba Ne Nyasaye shiyachama abamabii tawe
Kakhukhusomelanga kano ni ebimanyisio nende obwitsulisio obwa machesi
Toto okhuchelasibwa khwa Isah ewa Nyasaye khulishinga okhuchelasibwa khwa Adam, yamulonga okhurula khwiloba mana namuboolela mbu; Ba mana! , naye naaba
Buno ni obwatoto okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo omulesi, kho olaba mubalia bakholanga tsinganakani tawe

Ne balakhureba –mukhuyingana- obumanyi buno nibumalile okhuulila baboolele mbu; “ itse khulaange Abana befu nende Abana benyu, Abakhasi befu nende Abakhasi benyu, nende efwe abeene nende enywe abeene, mana khusabe mubwihotselefu nikhwenya eshilaamo shia Nyasaye shishile ababeyi.”
Toto kano niko amakhuwa katoto. Ne abulao Nyasaye wundi owulali Nyasaye tawe, Ne toto Nyasaye niye Owamani Owamachesi muno
Ne nibakhaya, manya mbu toto Nyasaye yamanya muno abonooni

Boola; “Enywe Abandu beshitabu itsee khulikhuwa elia habwene hakari wefu ninenyu, khulalaama yesiyesi owulali Nyasaye tawe, ne khulamutsokaasiakhwo nende shiosishosi tawe, nekhulakholana efwe khwifwe okhuba eminyasaye emilesi chilali Nyasaye tawe.” Nenibakhaya boole mbu; “Mube abaloli mbu efwe khuli Abasalamu.”
Enywe Abandu beshitabu, shichila shina nimuyingananga khu Ibraheem, ne Itaurati nende Injili shibieshibwa halali niyakhamala okhutsia. shimuparangakhwo tawe
Lola enywe bano muyingananga khumakhuwa ka mumanyile, Ne shichila shina lano muyingananga khumakhuwa kamukorerwe? Ne Nyasaye amanyile nanyu shimumanyile tawe
Ibraheem shiayali omuyahudi nohomba omukiristo tawe, halali yali omulunjifu omwihotselefu ne shiyali mubatsookasi tawe
Abandu bali ahambi nende Ibraheem muno ni balia abamuloonda nende Omurumwa uno nende Abasuubili. Ne Nyasaye niye Omuliindi wabasuubili
Kuliwo omukanda mubandu beshitabu bekoombanga okhubakosia, ne shibakosia tawe halali bekosia abeene, nabo shibamanyile tawe
Enywe Abandu beshitabu, shichila shina mukhayanga ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye na enywe toto nimulolanga
Enywe Abandu beshitabu shichila shina nimufwalanga obwatoto obubeyi nemufisanga obwatoto nimumanyile
Ne omukanda mubandu bahebwa eshitabu, baboola mbu; “suubile khukalia keshilibwa Abasuubili okhuchaka khweshitere, ne mukakhaye okhuwa kweshitere, babebario khobanyoole okhukalukha

Ne mulasuubila yesiyesi tawe halali ulia waloonda idini yenyu. Boola; “toto obulunjifu ni obulunjifu bwa Nyasaye, Omundu ahelesibwe shinga enywe mwahelesibwa, nohomba babarebe imbeli wa Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, Boola; “Toto tsimbabaasi tsili mumikhono chia Nyasaye. Yelesinjia owayenya, Ne Nyasaye ni Omuyinda Owamachesi muno
Yawulanga owayenya okhumwa tsimbabaasi tsitsie,ne Nyasayeniye Owetsimbabaasi tsikhongo
